title: North Carolina Firm Recalls Portobello Mushroom Flavored Pork Loins Due to Mislabeling and an Undeclared Allergen
summary: Corrected copy, plus an Editor's note: Editor's Note: FSIS updated the release the same day of issue to reflect additional information from the recalling company, including updated poundage and revised use by dates. WASHINGTON, May 4, 2011 - Smithfield Packing Company of Clinton, NC and...
impacted_products: Various weight individual packages of "Smithfield Portobello Mushroom Pork Loin Filet."
